bboxes.raw_text:
WASHINGTON The Supreme
Court refused to upset a ruling
that school boundaries need not
be drawn to force migration
when they show no intention to
segregate the races.


The high courts refusal to
hear the Gary, Indiana case does
not necessarily mean 1t agrees
with the lower courts decision.
This inconclusive status is a
disappointment to many on both
sides of the issue.


The court also refused to re-
view decision that Negro pupils
are entitled to have their entire
school system on a nonracial
basis, including assignment of
teachers, supervisors and sup
porting pers onnel.

Court Refuses
To Review


Pupil Bound ury
Plan Of Gary

NOTASULGA, Ala. Six Ne
gro pupils returned to class under
federal court order at Macon
County High School under Ala
bama state troopers guard.


The Negroes we're assigned
space in the auditorium of the
fire-ravaged building.


The auditorium was not dam
aged by the early morning blaze.


Only three weeks of class re-
main for the Negroes who will
attend school by themselves.
White students at the high school
staged a lO0-per-cent-effective
boycott shortly after the Negroes
were enrolled last February un-
der federal court order in this
Central Alabama county where
Negroes outnumber whites more
than 4 to /.

LOS ANG ELES : Ruby Dee, &C
tress of screen, stage and tele-
vision, was nominated Tuesday
for one of TVS Emmy awards.
for an outstanding single per-
Torrance by an actress ina lead
ing role.


Also nominated was Carl Lee,
who won honors for an outStand-
ing performance by an actor in
a supporting role.


Both won their nominations
for parts in the same show, an
episode in the Nurses" series.
The episode in which they ap-
peared was entitled Express
Stop from Lemox Avenue


Joey Bishop will NC the May
Is awards show over NBC. in
this the 10th annual presentation
of Emmys.

Ruby pee
And Carl Lee
No minated For Emmys

NEW YORK : A Negro youth
sought in l3-state police alarm
in connection with the Staying of
Hungarian woman refugee sur
rendered.


Wallace Baker, l8, walked into
a Harlem police station, accom-
panied by a lawyer. Police have
said Baker was the actual killer
of Mrs. Magit Sugar in Har-
lem secondhand clothing store
she operated with her husband.

nostalgia relved last Wednesday at Harmon
group of and recalled past events
Members of the graduating High School
prepared plans for their tenth anniversary reunion


Shown above are eated Harris Mines Betty Mckinney
Marva Newkirk Evaline Dykes and Samuel Engram.


Standing are Thomas Dykes Moore Degen
Clark IT, Patterson Jackson John R. Davis Calvin
Williams and Howard Decker.


Interested should contact Degene Clark Tor tuer
formal Call 278-17O4

Arizona retail sales scared to
the all-time peak of $2.2 bill
lion during 1868. AS total retail
volume climbed 4.7% above

STATESViLLE, NC. - A cor
oner's jury ruled Benjamin San
ford Carlton, 40, Negro candi-
date for the Irdell County Board
of Commissioners, died April %
of self-inflicted gunshot wound.


Witnesses told the all-Negro
jury Carlton had been depressed
because of financial difficulties.

l96Ts $2.l billion.


1t was the 18th consecutive
year that Arizona percentage
increase was greater than the
u. s.. as a whole.

The annual city Eks oratocal sponsored by the Pat
Grand Temple held Sunday South
minister Presbyterian Church, 1923 E. Broadway.


Top Kirk South High second
right accepting trophy from Mrs. James McElroy educa-
ton director.


Tommy Bastan, second place. of North High,
Mrs. McEroy Boone third place,
of Tempe High.


Other participants the annual Eks oratoral Sunday
included Dorothy Price, Carl Hayden Hg Linda Bosley Glendale
High; Lorraine Newman, South High and Leo Kreiden.

Jill of America installed Saturday,


New Mesdames Cecil Scott editor In chief c. A.
Battle program chairman Virgil Bryant historian Helen ODre
recording William Warren
president Margaret Reeder, president ggs


Standing Bryant Bertha Solomon Owens
Lois Myers Lucy McCray Vadia Smith, Meba Galloway Ophea
Joseph and Henrietta Graves. tsut


New accepted Mesdames William Owens Dam
lei Myers and Bob McCray. 80 N{lss5
